layout.name: Contempo
layout.description:
Clean.  Modern.  Professional.
Contempo's streamlined design features your latest book on the front page, ready for your readers to find.  Your it's subtle graphics and color schemes, your content come first.  Also included are a blog, a calendar, a biography, and a contact link.
layout.setup:
person_id = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("people", "default_biography") person = Roxiware::Person.find(person_id)
author_name = @current_layout.get_by_path("_/header_bar/logo_bar/display_items/item-0/text") author_name.value = person.full_name author_name.save!
subtitle = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "subtitle") subtitle_item = @current_layout.get_by_path("_/header_bar/logo_bar/display_items/item-1/text") subtitle_item.value = subtitle subtitle_item.save!
Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "webmaster_email", "9041D4FC-D97F-44F0-BFF2-FC2B4D3F6270", person.email) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "title", "0B8CFD7C-39AA-4E61-A4F2-9E7212EF9415", person.full_name) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "site_copyright", "4454EFC0-EC3C-4C9D-8EF5-6F848E3B33D7", person.full_name) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "meta_description", "F0E1D8A9-33B9-4605-B10F-831D2BB3D423", person.full_name) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "meta_keywords", "1843B11F-EBA1-4B9A-A01F-F98A3E458FA8", person.full_name+", #{subtitle}") Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("blog", "blog_editor_email", "89139210-E699-4D47-A656-B2F860D2015B", person.email) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("blog", "blog_title", "3D102055-8C9B-4838-90F7-2B3C7DB23A1D", person.full_name)
Roxiware::Page.find_or_create_by_page_identifier("contact").save!
books_menu_permission = @current_layout.get_by_path("_/header_bar/main_menu/menu_root/child_2/permission") books_menu_permission.value=(Roxiware::Book.all.count > 0) ? "guest" : "admin" books_menu_permission.save!
